assessment_template_create_payload.title: Digital Work Analytics Assessment
assessment_template_create_payload.description: This 16-point assessment helps organizations evaluate their digital work environment through the lens of visibility, focus, wellness, and adaptability. Each item is designed to surface meaningful signals about how people actually work — across tools, time, and teams — and where leadership can better support effectiveness, well-being, and impact.

categories.title: Work Visibility & Transparency
categories.description: Evaluates whether leaders and teams have clear insight into how digital work is being done across tools, time, and teams. Visibility fuels alignment, reduces friction, and reveals opportunities to support people more effectively.

questions.title: Application Usage Clarity
questions.description: Evaluates whether the organization has visibility into what platforms, tools, and apps are being used across roles and departments.
questions.remediation_tips: Start with a high-level app usage report. Map to roles or departments. Use as a discovery artifact — not an audit.

criteria.description: Tool usage is unknown or assumed
Some awareness, but no central view
Clear visibility into app usage trends

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "Do you know which platforms are used most in your business? Are you surprised by tool sprawl?" Look for data, not assumptions.

questions.title: Shadow IT Detection
questions.description: Assesses the ability to identify tools being used outside of IT's visibility — including browser apps, personal logins, or team-specific subscriptions.
questions.remediation_tips: Use usage monitoring to identify blind spots. Frame findings around duplication, cost, and risk — not policing.

criteria.description: No ability to see or manage shadow IT
Shadow IT is monitored and addressed constructively

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "Have you ever discovered tools people were using that you didn't approve or know about?"

questions.title: Collaboration vs. Focus Split
questions.description: Evaluates the balance between collaborative work and focused individual work across teams and roles.
questions.remediation_tips: Analyze work patterns to understand collaboration vs. focus needs. Provide appropriate tools and environments for both.

criteria.description: No understanding of work pattern balance
Clear understanding and support for work patterns

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you balance collaborative and focused work in your organization?"

questions.title: Cross-Team Work Visibility
questions.description: Assesses visibility into how work flows across different teams and departments.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement cross-team visibility tools and processes. Focus on workflow optimization, not surveillance.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How well do you understand work flows across different teams?"

categories.title: Focus & Productivity
categories.description: Evaluates the organization's ability to support focused, productive work and minimize distractions.

questions.title: Meeting Effectiveness
questions.description: Assesses the quality and effectiveness of meetings across the organization.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement meeting guidelines, time limits, and effectiveness tracking. Focus on outcomes, not just attendance.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How effective are meetings in your organization?"

questions.title: Distraction Management
questions.description: Evaluates how well the organization manages distractions and supports focused work.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement quiet hours, focus time policies, and distraction management tools.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you manage distractions and support focused work?"

questions.title: Workflow Optimization
questions.description: Assesses the optimization of digital workflows and processes.
questions.remediation_tips: Analyze and optimize digital workflows. Remove friction and automate repetitive tasks.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How optimized are your digital workflows?"

questions.title: Productivity Measurement
questions.description: Evaluates how productivity is measured and tracked across the organization.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement meaningful productivity metrics. Focus on outcomes, not just activity.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you measure productivity in your organization?"

categories.title: Wellness & Work-Life Balance
categories.description: Evaluates the organization's support for employee wellness and work-life balance.

questions.title: Work Hours Monitoring
questions.description: Assesses how work hours are monitored and managed to prevent burnout.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement work hours monitoring and policies to prevent burnout. Focus on wellness, not surveillance.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you monitor and manage work hours?"

questions.title: Wellness Support
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's support for employee wellness and mental health.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement wellness programs, mental health support, and work-life balance initiatives.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you support employee wellness?"

questions.title: Boundary Setting
questions.description: Assesses how well the organization helps employees set and maintain work-life boundaries.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement boundary-setting policies and support. Encourage healthy work-life balance.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you help employees set work-life boundaries?"

questions.title: Stress Management
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's approach to managing workplace stress.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement stress management programs and support systems.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you support stress management in the workplace?"

categories.title: Adaptability & Learning
categories.description: Evaluates the organization's ability to adapt to changing work environments and support continuous learning.

questions.title: Digital Skills Development
questions.description: Assesses the organization's support for developing digital skills and competencies.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement digital skills training programs and continuous learning initiatives.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you support digital skills development?"

questions.title: Change Management
questions.description: Evaluates how well the organization manages digital transformation and change.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement effective change management processes and support systems.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you manage digital transformation and change?"

questions.title: Innovation Support
questions.description: Assesses the organization's support for innovation and experimentation.
questions.remediation_tips: Create environments that support innovation and experimentation. Encourage creative problem-solving.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you support innovation and experimentation?"

questions.title: Continuous Improvement
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's commitment to continuous improvement in digital work practices.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement continuous improvement processes and feedback loops.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you support continuous improvement in digital work?"
